did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Center for International Studies records, 1960-1983.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Cornell University Center for International Studies.

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Records of of the Air War in Indochina Study Group, conducted by Raphael Littauer and Norman Uphoff, which led to the publication of The Air War in Indochina, with an introduction by Neil Sheehan, 1972

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Cornell University. Air War Study Group.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Center for International Studies Records, #53-5-2158. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: RELATED MATERIALS
relatedmaterial.p: See also the Center for International Studies Research Material, #53-5-1606 and the Ford Foundation Proposal, #53-5-1533.

Southeast Asia Development Advising Group conference audio reels

scopecontent.p: Reels appear to be from a conference with support from the Rockefeller Foundation and the United States Agency for International Development. A number of individuals from Southeast Asian countries are in attendance and are introduced by the emcee on side 1 of the first reel.

did.unittitle: Reel 1/2

scopecontent.p: Side 1: Harry Oshima. Side 2: Warren Ilchman

did.unittitle: Reel 3/4

scopecontent.p: Side 1: Discussion, Pol and Admin, Montgomery, Napitupulu. Side 2: Napitupulu, Pradoldej, Kaminruddin, Wong, Patten.

scopecontent.p: Side 1: Patten, Sibero, Banskota. Side 2: Banskota, Vichit, Bhalla, Chira.

scopecontent.p: Side 1: Chira, Chang, Ayub. Side 2: Ayub, Esman, Bhalla.

scopecontent.p: Side 1: Locsin, Osatananda, Pham, Alfonso. Side 2: Alfonso, Discussion, Final Session

did.unittitle: Reel 11

scopecontent.p: Side 1: Final Session, Multiple Cropping, End. Side 2: Blank
